content: Another great Sarah Tavel post. For a purpose-driven company like ours, your focus on the “user trust bank” is absolutely critical. It impacts everything end-to-end, in the big things (like how you generate revenue) and in the small details (like how you playback and reflect users’ lives in ways both meaningful and actionable). I can’t overstate how important that is when you’re handling the precious cargo of your users’ financial lives.
